articles.title: Singapore orders crypto exchange platform Binance.com to stop payment services - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has ordered Binance to stop providing payment services in Singapore and to cease soliciting business from Singapore residents.
